summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4331 for the improvement of North and East 77th Street; from Corliss Avenue to 5th Avenue Northeast, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51311, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
